#include<iostream>
    #include <stdio.h>
    using namespace std;

    int main()
    {
        unsigned int t;

        scanf("%u", &t);

    while(t--)
    {
        int a, b, r, i, j;
        long long x = 1LL;
        scanf("%u %u", &a, &b);
        i = 1;
        j = a;
        r = (b < (a-b)) ? b : (a-b);
        while(i <= r)
            x = (x*j--)/i++;


        printf("%Ld\n", x);
    }

return 0;
}
